person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PLO negotiators said on Friday Palestinian President Yasser Arafat , Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak might all meet on Saturday to try to clinch a deal on Israel 's handover of Hebron to the PLO .

Let's think step by step.

1. PLO negotiators
2. Palestinian President Yasser Arafat
3. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu
4. Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Palestinian President Yasser Arafat
2. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu
3. Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak
4. PLO negotiators (implied to be persons)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Palestinian President Yasser Arafat |
| Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu |
| Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak |
| PLO negotiators |

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PLO negotiators said on Friday Palestinian President Yasser Arafat , Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak might all meet on Saturday to try to clinch a deal on Israel 's handover of Hebron to the PLO .

Let's think step by step.

1. PLO negotiators (represents the Palestinian Liberation Organization, which is a political and militant organization established for the purpose of achieving a Palestinian state)
2. Palestinian President Yasser Arafat (represents the location of the Palestinian Authority, which was headed by Arafat at the time)
3. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu (represents the location of the Israeli government, headed by Netanyahu at the time)
4. Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak (represents the location of Egypt, where the meeting was to take place)
5. Hebron (represents the specific location in the West Bank that was the subject of the negotiations)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.
1. Hebron (represents the specific location in the West Bank that was the subject of the negotiations)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PLO negotiators said on Friday Palestinian President Yasser Arafat , Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak might all meet on Saturday to try to clinch a deal on Israel 's handover of Hebron to the PLO .

Let's think step by step.

1. PLO (Palestine Liberation Organization) - This is the organization represented by the negotiators in the paragraph.
2. Palestinian President Yasser Arafat - This is an individual, but he is the president of the PLO and the Palestinian Authority, so he can also be considered as a part of the PLO organization in this context.
3. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu - This is an individual, but he is the prime minister of Israel, which is a separate organization from the PLO.
4. Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak - This is an individual, but he is the president of Egypt, which is also a separate organization from the PLO.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.
1. PLO (Palestine Liberation Organization) - This is the organization mentioned in the paragraph that is involved in the negotiations.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
